entity.description: Defines free/busy times for a service and for resources or resource groups, such as working, non-working, vacation, and blocked.

attributes.name: isvaried
attributes.description: Flag used in leaf nonrecurring rules.

attributes.name: rank
attributes.description: Rank of the calendar rule.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the calendar rule was created.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the calendar rule.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Defines free/busy times for a service and for resources or resource groups, such as working, non-working, vacation, and blocked.

attributes.name: calendarruleid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the calendar rule.

attributes.name: effort
attributes.description: Effort available for a resource during the time described by the calendar rule.

attributes.name: endtime
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: timecode
attributes.description: Type of calendar rule such as working hours, break, holiday, or time off.

attributes.name: starttime
attributes.description: Start time for the rule.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the calendar rule.

attributes.name: businessunitid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit with which the calendar rule is associated.

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: Start offset for leaf nonrecurring rules.

attributes.name: issimple
attributes.description: Flag used in vary-by-day calendar rules.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the calendar rule.

attributes.name: timezonecode
attributes.description: Local time zone for the calendar rule.

attributes.name: organizationid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization with which the calendar rule is associated.

attributes.name: isselected
attributes.description: Flag used in vary-by-day calendar rules.

attributes.name: extentcode
attributes.description: Extent of the calendar rule.

attributes.name: effectiveintervalend
attributes.description: Effective interval end of the calendar rule.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the calendar rule was last modified.

attributes.name: calendarid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the calendar with which the calendar rule is associated.

attributes.name: innercalendarid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the inner calendar for non-leaf calendar rules.

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description: Pattern of the rule recurrence.

attributes.name: groupdesignator
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the group.

attributes.name: ismodified
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: subcode
attributes.description: Sub-type of calendar rule.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: Duration of the calendar rule in minutes.

attributes.name: effectiveintervalstart
attributes.description: Effective interval start of the calendar rule.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the calendarrule.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the calendarrule.
